mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.doc_id AS "doc_id", a.se_id AS "se_id", a.jbggwsfwjgjk AS "jbggwsfwjgjk", a.jbylfwjgjk AS "jbylfwjgjk", a.jbywjgjk AS "jbywjgjk", a.xnhbcjgjk AS "xnhbcjgjk"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ironfo_information_sx_jgjk( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, doc_id, se_id, jbggwsfwjgjk, jbylfwjgjk, jbywjgjk, xnhbcjgjk ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{doc_id}, #{se_id}, #{jbggwsfwjgjk}, #{jbylfwjgjk}, #{jbywjgjk}, #{xnhbcjgjk} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ironfo_information_sx_jgjk SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, doc_id = #{doc_id}, se_id = #{se_id}, jbggwsfwjgjk = #{jbggwsfwjgjk}, jbylfwjgjk = #{jbylfwjgjk}, jbywjgjk = #{jbywjgjk}, xnhbcjgjk = #{xnhbcjgjk} WHERE id = #{id}
